name: Verify login fails when email field is blank.
description: Checks that an empty email field returns HTTP 400 or validation error.
descriptionHtml: Checks that an empty email field returns HTTP 400 or validation error.
statusMessage: Expected 4xx for blank email expected [true] but found [false]
